com.mobilecoin.lib.log

Interface LogAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DebugLogAdapter

    public interface LogAdapter
    Configurable log output conduit

      boolean isLoggable(Logger.Level logLevel, String tag)
      Determine whether the log entry should be logged or not
      void log(Logger.Level logLevel, String tag, String message, Throwable throwable, Object... metadata)

    • Method Detail

      • isLoggable

        boolean isLoggable(Logger.Level logLevel,
                   @NonNull
                   String tag)
        Determine whether the log entry should be logged or not
        Parameters:
        logLevel - is the level of log priority and importance e.g. DEBUG, WARNING
        tag - is the given tag for the log message

      • log

        void log(Logger.Level logLevel,
         @NonNull
         String tag,
         @NonNull
         String message,
         @Nullable
         Throwable throwable,
         @NonNull
         Object... metadata)
        Each log will use this pipeline
        Parameters:
        logLevel - is the level of log priority and importance e.g. DEBUG, WARNING
        tag - is the given tag for the log message.
        message - is the given message for the log message.
        throwable - (optional) an exception to log
